To return your YETI product, follow the steps below:
Please make sure your YETI is clean and dry on the inside.
Print the attached RMA form and include it with your package. (Place it inside the cooler or along with the items you are returning.)
Print the attached prepaid FedEx shipping label.
A FedEx drop box will not work for the return. FedEx Ground pick up can be scheduled by calling FedEx customer service at 1-800-463-3339.
Please request a copy of your receipt and a tracking number for your records.
Once we receive your return, you will be sent a confirmation email.
We will do our best to complete your return/refund within 7 business days after receiving your product. During peak season times it may take up to 15 business days.
Thank you for being a YETI customer. Please let us know if you have any questions.
